text: CAPTION: 26th January 2002 A Sheraton car pulls up and STEVE LeVINE, a discreet and serious looking man, gets out. His driver brings boxes of office supplies from the car. There are various phone company workers in the street and an argument going on wi one of the neighbours in the background. CAPTION : STEVE LeVINE, CENTRAL ASIA CORRESPONDENT, WALL
He shows his US passport and is let through by the GUARDS

HASAN is busy setting up and plugging in speaker phones. The information has to be shared by all. TWO PAKISTANI COMPUTER EXPERTS work on computers. STEVE LEVINE enters and sees MARIANE. STEVE hugs her.
I got here as soon as I could. How are you?
I‘m Ok.
No news?
No.  Pink Revision - 27th Sept 2006 55A ASRA comes down the stairs.
You two must know each other. Working for the same paper?
We've never met. I’m Steve LeVine.
Asra Nomani.
I brought some office supplies.
Great. ASRA notices a PAKISTANI PHONE COMPANY MAN is putting in extra phone lines. They speak in Urdu.
(to the Phone Man) How many lines are you hooking up?
Six. We're getting the lines from your neighbours.
What about their phones?  Pink Revision - 27th Sept 2006 56
Cut off.
Oh my God, we're going to need extra police just to keep us safe from the neighbours. (To Steve) Would you like some tea?
That'd be great. ASRA goes off to ask SHABIR to make some tea. STEVE tries to gauge MARIANE’s state of mind. He’s immediately impressed by her focus.
How was the honeymoon?
Good. MARIANE introduces STEVE to HASAN. The TWO MEN shake hand The two immediately like each other.
Steve and Danny worked together in Islamabad.

The reception is crowded with JOURNALISTS and CAMERA CREW STEVE and DANNY are eating breakfast. MARIANE is talking other JOURNALISTS by the reception. She sees a famous US correspondent crossing to the exit and dashes after her.
Hi, I’m from French radio and I’m doing an article about the way the Western media is covering the war in Afghanistan.
Yeah? Well I’m part of the Western media and I’m covering the war in Afghanistan. The journalist walks off leaving MARIANE a little crestfallen. She glances across to DANNY and STEVE. DANNY laughs.
= ’ = 106 The Chart. It’s gradually becoming more and more detailed As we hear STEVE we see the names he mentions:
So they still need to find Arif the go- between... Bashir in Rawalpindi, Imtiaz Siddique here in Karachi and Gilani wherever he is.
And Danny.
And Danny. STEVE looks at MARIANE.
Do you think it’s connected to the story he was working on?  Pink Revision - 27th Sept 2006 58
We don’t know. You saw this? MARIANE hands STEVE the story from the Boston Globe which made the link between Richard Reid and Gilani. We see glimpses of the text as the conversation continues.
But it could be something else. Every story here leads back to jihadis.
Or the intelligence services. Or both.
I can go through all the stories we worked on together. See if anything connects.

I‘ll help you. PICK UP on the office later. STEVE and ASRA are working away on their computers checki through DANNY‘s old stories and going on the internet to get more information. ZAFIR and HASAN are working on the mails sent by BASHIR. The CAPTAIN arrives with DOST.
Sheikh Mubarak Ali Shah Gilani. DOST hands a photograph over to ASRA. She sticks it onto The Chart.
We sent officers to his house in Lahore. No one’s there. None of his wives. MARIANE looks at the photo of GILANI.
How many has he?
Three. The latest is a 23 year old Canadian. ASRA writes this on the chart.  59.
The only person they managed to find is his sister-in-law. She says he isn’t capable of organizing a kidnapping.
Who needs enemies with relatives like that?
On a computer screen, an article from the Independent. January 24th.
Hasan - can you print this out?
What is it?
It’s from the London bureau. About a British Pakistani - Omar Saeed Sheikh. HASAN brings a printed copy of the article over to ASRA.
It claims he wired $100,000 to Mohammed Atta just before 9/11.
How does this connect with Danny? ASRA is reading the article on Steve’s computer.
He’s based in Rawalpindi and he specialises in kidnapping Westerners. MARIANE and ASRA look at CAPTAIN.
Do you know him?
Only by reputation. MARIANE starts to read the article when the phone rings. ASRA answers it. KHAWAJA is shouting at her down the line

(Speaking in Urdu) Don’t talk to me like that. It’s nothing to do with us.  60. CAPTAIN motions for ASRA to hand over the phone to him. H walks off with the receiver talking in a low controlled voice.
(Speaking in Urdu) This is the SSP CID He listens to KHAWAJA as he walks away with the phone.
Who was that?

Khalid Khawaja. He’s a friend of Gilani’s. He keeps on calling. Gilani’s father died last week and now he’s screaming at me claiming he died from shame - because of the Boston Globe article connecting his son to the terrorists.
The power of the press. CAPTAIN comes back with the phone.
Mr. Khawaja won’t be phoning you again.
Thank you. PICK UP ON RANDALL BENNETT coming into the house, full of energy. CAPTION: 13.15 26th January 2002
Okay girls, I’m taking you to McDonald’s.
No. I can’t... I’d rather stay here.
You need some air. Come on. Think of your son.
What about the phones?

Don’t you trust Hasan and Dost?  107 107pt 108 109 61. MARIANE looks at RANDALL. INT/EXT - RANDALL’S 4X4/ KARACHI STREETS - DAY 107 RANDALL's Black Chevy drives through the Karachi traffic. They go past the Two Swords roundabout where SHABIR got t taxis. MARIANE sits in the car, her mind drifting. Her life suspended. She looks round and sees Danny sitting with her in a taxi driving through the 107p streets of Paris They arrive at the Park Tower Shopping Mall. INT_- SHOPPING MALL — DAY 108 A shopping mall. Shiny clean and uniform. Western lifesty in a laboratory. RANDALL leads ZAFIR, Asra and Mariane pa the clothes shops to McDonalds. As they walk in RANDALL bumps into TWO YOUNG AUSTRALIAN TOURISTS.
Oh sorry.
No problem. Do it again anytime. The GIRL laughs. ASRA, MARIANE and ZAFIR go through.
Where are you girls from?
Sydney... Australia. And you?
(smiles) Me. Oh I’m from here.
It's filled with PAKISTANIS enjoying their Meal Deals. AS is wolfing her meal down.
How long have you been in Karachi?  110 111 62.
Five years. You’re only supposed to be here for a year because it’s a high risk posting. But I love it here. MARIANE picks at her salad.
Why?
The people. Like Zafir. He’s my brother. ZAFIR smiles.
Thank you.
Should we be worried about the I.S.I. bugging the house?

You can trust Dost and the Captain. But you can never be sure with the other guys. MARIANE has another go at her salad but gives up. = ‘ = 110 RANDALL’s black chevy drops ASRA and MARIANE back at the house. CAPTION : 15.30 26th JANUARY 2006 = ‘ = 111 The CAPTAIN, DOST, KALEEM YUSUF, HASAN and everyone are there. STEVE hands over a printed out e-mail to MARIANE a soon as she and ASRA enter the room.

There’s been another e-mail from Bashir. The Journal sent it over from Washington. As we see the text of the e-mail beginning - Dear Mr. Pea how did the meeting with the Shaikh go? - we hear ASRA’s immediate reaction.  112 113 63.
The fucker. He knows Danny’s missing. I e-mailed him the first night. DOsT He’s trying to look innocent. As though he knows nothing.

(to Mariane) You should do the same. Answer as though you suspect nothing. PICK UP on MARIANE as she writes her e-mail to BASHIR. He features are tense. She hates this man. On the screen, we see fragments : I am Danny Pearl’s wife...I am very concerned...I appreciate your concern... thank you so much.. The phone rings. ASRA answers.
Hello. Oh hello John. Yeah we saw it. Yes. Here she is. She passes it to MARIANE.
It’s Bussey. He wants to talk to you, MARIANE paces around the room on the phone to BUSSEY.
Yes I’m ok. We need you here.

head_text.subj: INT_- WALL STREET JOURNAL NEW JERSEY

text: BUSSEY is on the phone in his office.
Come to Karachi. Make the diplomatic rounds with us. We need to put pressure on the authorities.
OK. That’s what I thought too. - ’ = 113 CAPTAIN looks at MARIANE. She looks drained from lack of sleep. She puts the phone down.  64.
Can I talk to you?
MARIANE and CAPTAIN sit, watching the parrots. CAPTAIN lights up a cigarette.

I need to tell you something. CAPTAIN looks up at MARIANE waiting for her to continue. MARIANE (CONT’D) Danny isn’t religious. But he is Jewish by birth. CAPTAIN takes a moment, registering the importance of thi fact. He knows how deep the hate runs.
Who else knows this?
He didn't advertise it, but he'd never deny it if someone asked. They sit there in silence.
I am religious. I go to the mosque for Friday prayers. I have faith. But you know Islam teaches peace. Not hatred.
I know.
My faith has been kidnapped by the same people who have taken Danny.
The FBI TEAM and ZAFIR work on the new e-mail. RANDALL BENNETT walks in.
Have you traced where it’s from?
Not yet.  116 Pink Revision ~ 27th Sept 2006 65

The house is quiet but for the distant sound of the call prayer before sunset. EVERYONE has gone home to their families for dinner. MARIANE is on the phone to SATCHI, her brother. INTERCUT : SATCHI stands in his Paris flat. CAPTION: SATCHI VAN NEYENHOFF, MARIANE’S BROTHER

Le gens envoient leur soutien du monde entier. Ils appellent tous les jours. Il faudrait que le monde entier medite avec nous. (People from all over the world are sending their support. I am receiving calls every day. What we need is for the whole world to chant with us.)

Oui... imagine. (Yes... imagine.) As MARIANE listens to SATCHI, she starts going through so of DANNY’s stuff. She finds and tapes up on the wall the comical photo of a giraffe and her baby that DANNY likes much. It looks like the giraffes are winking.
Ca va? (How are you?)
Oui... Ca va. Le bebe bouge. (Yes... I’m okay. The baby’s moving.) MARIANE lies down on the couch.
Il ne me donne pas de coups de pieds. Il veut just dire qu’il est la. (He doesn’t kick. He’s just saying he’s here.)
Ca va aller. Tout va bien se passer. (It’s going to be all right. You’re going to be fine.) Ht He KK RH
se OR OF ee ed eH EK  117 118 Pink Revision - 27th Sept 2006 65A MARIANE picks up and starts flicking absently through her pregnancy book. “What to expect when you are expecting”.

NOOR and MASUD sit in a car watching as FIFTEEN or TWENTY POLICE enter the Hotel Akbar. MASUD looks somber. INT - HOTEL AKBAR/RAWALPINDI ~— NIGHT 118 The HOTEL RECEPTIONIST and OTHER STAFF are being picked u by the POLICE for questioning.  119 120 121 122 123 124 125 66.
NOOR looks at MASUD expectantly as the MEN are being brought out of the hotel.
Recognise anyone?
No. = f = 120 MARIANE lies in bed with her “what to do when expecting” book. Unable to sleep. Unable to read.

NOOR and TWENTY POLICEMEN IN PLAIN CLOTHES armed with AK4 automatics, storm through rooms, climbing up stairs, searching and examining furniture, rummaging through drawers. The house was the HQ of the Harkat- ul-Mujahideen in Rawalpindi. There are quite a FEW MEN, posters and piles videos.

RANDALL is typing up a report of the days events includin the raids in Rawalpindi. = ‘ = 124 MARIANE lies in bed awake. She keeps her hands on her swollen belly and chants to herself. = ’ =. 125 DOST walks into the house, looking stressed, carrying copies of the newspaper Jang. CAPTION: 09.00 27th January 2002  126 67.

A newspaper - Jang ~ lies on the table with a picture of DANNY on the front page, smiling out at us. The same photograph MARIANE gave to the police the first morning after DANNY's kidnapping. DOST and CAPTAIN look at MARIANE. MARIANE, expressionless, waits for them to talk. A tense silence.
What does it say? DOsT It says that Danny is suspected of being a Mossad agent and of having relations with India’s intelligence agency. MARIANE looks like she’s just been kicked in the stomach.
What? She stares at the photo of DANNY smiling at her. Her voic cracks with anger.
I gave them that photo! The police asked me for a photo of Danny. Who was that guy I gave the photo to?!!
Military intelligence. MARIANE paces like a wounded animal, drowning in her own powerlessness.
'‘Mossad,' for fuck's sake! They'11 kill him if they think he's Mossad! What are we going to do? What are you people doing? She picks up the phone and dials a number she gets from T Chart.
I want to speak to Minister Haider. Mariane Pearl....Mariane Pearl... MARIANE is almost shouting  127 68.
Mariane Pearl..the wife of the kidnapped journalist. She sees CAPTAIN watching her. He’s upset and angry but hides it.

Let me deal with it. You are right but let me deal with it. DANNY smiles out of the paper at MARIANE. INT_- ASRA’S HOUSE - DAY/LATER 127 ASRA and LeVINE are glued to their computers. The tension is palpable. Everyone is demoralized after the morning’s Jang headline. They’re all hot, exhausted and on edge. The phone rings. ASRA picks up. She listens, digesting wh is being said at the other end and rushes to her computer
There’s an e-mail. It’s from the kidnappers. EVERYONE stops in their tracks.
The Journal’s forwarding it to us. EVERYONE gathers around the computer to look at the e-mai from kidnapperguy@hotmail.com

There’s an attachment. ASRA clicks on the attachment. The first photo opens : DANNY, in front of a blue screen, wearing a shiny hot pink and baby blue jogging suit. His wrists are in chains and his glasses have gone. A MAN ina white salwar kameez grips the back of his head shoving it forward and with his other hand, levels a revolver an inc from his head.
They do it to shock you. MARIANE looks at the photos without flinching, torn by conflicting emotions but shocked back into defiance when she notices DANNY’s smile on the third photo.
He’s smiling.  69. As we see the photos ASRA reads out the e-mail.

The national movement for the restoration of Pakistani sovereignty has captured CIA officer Daniel Pearl who has been posing as a journalist of the Wall Street Journal. MARIANE is focusing on DANNY’s face, on his smile.

Unfortunately he is at present being kept in very inhuman conditions quite similar in fact to the way that Pakistanis ...are being kept in Cuba by the American army...if America wants the release of Mr. Pearl all .-Pakistani prisoners in Cuba must be returned to Pakistan...
Who the fuck are they?
Some group they made up for this. (to Dost) Call Randall Bennett.
There's more in Urdu. CAPTAIN leans in with his cigarette.
What does it say?
They are asking for the release of fighter jets that Pakistan bought from the US in the eighties.
This is crazy. It makes no fucking sense. Print outs of DANNY’s photos are being spewed out of the laser printer.
What are they up to? They don't want to negotiate with us.  128 70. ASRA spreads the photos on the table. A piece of paper has been taped to a phone : "DO NOT TOUC
A new answering machine is being attached to it. CAPTAIN instructing ASRA and MARIANE.

Nobody touches this line. This is the number Danny knows. This is the number he will use to contact you. CAPTAIN and DOST are busy making hundreds of calls. = t = 128 CAPTION: 11.00 27th January 2002 RANDALL, ZAFIR, MAUREEN PLATT, JOHN and TWO OTHER FBI AGENTS stride into the house.
They’ve made contact. The FBI AGENTS immediately start their work to source the computer who sent the e-mail.
We need the original e-mail so we can see the header. That might give us an IP address.
It was originally sent to the Washington Post.
RANDALL and MAUREEN PLATT study the photos for authentici around the table.
That’s a doctored photo. Check out the angle of the shoulder. That doesn’t look right with the head. The legs are too big. That’s not Danny.
I don’t think it’s Danny either.  71.
Let’s send them to the lab in Honolulu.
Maureen, look at the gun. EVERYONE has a theory. Only MARIANE is silent. CAPTAIN is looking at her.
Mariane? What do you think?
It's him. It's Danny. EVERYONE becomes silent.
We should still send it off to Honolulu. The phone rings. MARIANE goes and picks it up. 129 = f = 129 RUTH is on the phone.
Have you seen them? The photos of Danny?
Yes. You’ve got them too?
They just came.
People here weren’t sure they were Danny.
Of course they are. I recognise his hands. We see the photograph of DANNY, and RUTH looking fondly a her son’s hands. 130 = t = = 130
I know. I recognise his wedding ring. It's loose on his finger. It's always been loose.  Blue Revision - 11th Oct 2006 72
It’s good news. MARIANE is blank.
It means Danny is alive. MARIANE’s features tense up. The stabbing pain of a contraction runs through her body. She holds her breath.
Mariane? The pain goes away.
Its important no one finds out we are from Israel. We are trying to get everything removed from the internet that might connect Danny to us.

They're going to release him. Nobody would ever want to hurt Danny. We see.for a moment Danny sitting in an anonymous room, i the clothes he wears in the photograph. MARIANE puts the phone down. CAPTAIN comes over to her. They look at the photographs together.
Look. Danny is smiling. With a gun to his head he’s smiling. He's telling me he is OK. A half-smile spreads unexpectedly on MARIANE’s face as sh notices DANNY’s fingers forming a 'V’.
(smiling as if smiling back at Danny) He's giving them the finger. A sense of pride at DANNY’s defiance.
I‘m sorry, but it is time to see Interior Minister Haider. ee ee
ee OF  Blue Revision - 1lth Oct 2006 72a

I‘ll take you. MARIANE doesn’t want to go now - but she knows she has to  131 132 133 73. = ’ = 131 In their Sunday best, a DELEGATION of plain clothes SENIO OFFICERS come and go in and out of the house and get into caravan of cars. A distinguished man with white hair, shakes hands with MARIANE.
A convoy, official cars and at the end of the caravan, th warn-out jeeps with CAPTAIN and DOST - driving through Karachi.

MARIANE sits with BAUMAN. She is tense. She stares out of the window, seeing the crowds of people, the mosques, the offices, the houses. We see Danny in the back of a taxi being driven through Karachi The convoy snakes its way through the thick traffic, braving the chaos and cacophony of the over-crowded, congested streets.
We need the Minister to authorise a national force to look for Danny. Just because he was taken here in Karachi doesn’t mean he is still here.
Right. Asra has arranged for Paul Steiger of the Journal to call us whilst we are there. To try and impress the minister..
Good. We should get a good hearing. Haider’s brother was assassinated only a month ago.
Really? How?

Shot driving home from work. MARIANE stares out at the cars and PEOPLE.  134 74. = ’ = 134 MARIANE and the whole ENTOURAGE are led into the MINISTER office. MARIANE shakes hands with MINISTER HAIDER who is traditional mourning dress.
Thank you for meeting us. I know you have your own problems.
Please, sit down. PICK UP later. The meeting has already been going on for while and everyone is getting tense.
Mrs. Pearl. Let me tell you something. We had three thousand journalists in Pakistan during the war in Afghanistan and not one of them got into trouble.
Danny and I were two of those journalists. I don’t see your point.
Why did your husband have to meet these people? This is not the business of a journalist. MARIANE feels the hostility.
It depends what you mean by journalist. Their eyes lock. MARIANE holds the MINISTER’s gaze.
Our information is that the Indian intelligence services are behind the kidnapping.
What?

They want to embarrass Pakistan by blaming Islamic extremists or the ISI for the disappearance of an American journalist.  135 136 75. MARIANE is furious. EVERYONE is tense. Then MARIANE’s cel phone rings. Mariane answers.
Hello .. Yes. One second. (to Haider) It is Paul Steiger, managing editor of the Wall Street Journal. He wants to talk to you. We see HAIDER talking on the phone. He is much more polit to Steiger.
EVERYONE is leaving, shaking hands and so on. ASRA, still angry, can’t help responding to HAIDER’s criticism of Danny.
(in Urdu softly) With all due respect minister, would you blame your brother for having been murdered just because he was driving the streets of Karachi? RANDALL BENNETT immediately intervenes
Asra we’re leaving.(to Haider) I’m sorry. We’re all very tired. INT/EXT HAIDER’S HOUSE ~ DAY 135 RANDALL is striding along ~ frustrated and angry. MARIANE and ASRA hurry to keep up with him.

A person can’t stay rational with lack of sleep. You both need some rest. (to Mariane) And you should know better. You know that you have chemicals running loose in your body. MARIANE can’t help a very faint smile. INT_- HAIDER'’S HOUSE~ DAY 136 HAIDER is also frustrated with his men.  137 138 139 140 76.

What’s wrong with you people? Why haven’t you found him yet? Get me the journalist! EXTZLINT - MADRASSA — NIGHT 137 FIFTEEN PLAIN CLOTHES POLICE - some with AK 47s - raid th place ~ pulling out half a DOZEN MEN.

Pictures of the World Trade Center and Osama Bin Laden on the Wall. ANOTHER BUNCH OF POLICE storm in and take away computers. EXT_ASRA’S HOUSE NIGHT 139 A car pulls up and KALEEM YUSUF gets out and is let into the house. INT_ASRA’S HOUSE NIGHT 140 CAPTAIN, DOST, ZAFIR, BENNETT, STEVE, ASRA and MARIANE ar there.
Mr. Yusuf founded the Citizens Police Liaison Committee. They specialize in kidnappings.
I’m sorry I wasn’t able to come sooner. I’ve been in Lahore.
But you met Danny on the day he was kidnapped?
That’s right. He told me he was meeting with Gilani. While he was with me he received two phone calls.
Two?
Yes. He produces a print out of phone calls connected to Danny We see the lists of calls.  142 776
The calls were connected to the meeting with Gilani. From the same number. The Imtiaz Siddique number. Then at 19.11 he received another call.
Danny is waiting on the sidewalk outside the restaurant. is on the phone. We see him talking but we don’t know wha he is saying. CAPTION: 19.11 23rd January 2002
The phone call lasted five minutes. We think it was from abroad as there is no record of the number. Danny crosses to the taxi.
You can go. I’m going to wait here. Thanks. He pays him and the taxi drives off, leaving Danny alone outside the restaurant. INT_ASRA’S HOUSE NIGHT 142
That was the last call he received. We see Mariane struggling to control her emotions.

We work with telephone numbers. We start with Danny’s number. And Arif’s, Imtiaz Siddique’s and Bashir’s. From these numbers we find their contacts. Then we obtain the numbers that they called. And so on. Until we find the kidnappers.
It’s a lot of work.  143 144 145 146 78.
It is. We have a team of ten people working on it. This is our business. We know what we are doing.
Mr. Yusuf and his team have a very high success rate.
We see people working at their computers. We see the screens. Lists of numbers are converted into charts. Any number called more than 5 times is then traced. It is a very sophisticated system.
NOOR comes and takes JAMAL PARACHA away for questioning.
Why are you doing this? You know I’ve done nothing wrong.
Do I?

The office/house of a political party. MORE POLICE break in, but the house is empty. RANDALL and CAPTAIN watch from outside. = ‘ = 146 MARIANE is lying in her bed. ASRA is lying behind her, stroking her neck and hair.
How does that feel?
Good. The house is quiet.
You think you will be able to sleep.  147 148 79.

No. MARIANE closes her eyes. (Danny is having his hair cut in Bombay. He sits in a dir white leather barber chair with red armrests. MARIANE follows the action in the mirror. Everything is silent bu for the snip of the scissors. Danny gives Mariane a goofy smile. His haircut is terrible). = f = 147 A phalanx of TV cameras. CNN, FOX, AL JAZEERA. CREWS get out of vans. Cameras, monitors, microphones, rolls of cables. CAPTION: 28th January 2002 = ’ = 148 CAPTAIN stares out at the international media circus gathering outside the house. He doesn’t look too happy about it.

I don’t want to talk to the press. I want Bussey to handle it all. The front door bell goes. DOST crosses the room to open t door to a skinny BEWILDERED MAN with an unkempt beard and piercing black eyes. He looks like he’s just came from th caves of Afghanistan. DOST takes one look at the MAN and bursts out laughing. DOsT Here is the driver for Bussey.
If Bussey sees him he’1ll be straight back on the plane to America.
Get a new driver. (To the driver) I’m sorry. CAPTAIN hands the driver a small note.  149 150 Pink Revision - 27th Sept 2006 80

BUSSEY sits in the back of the taxi being driven from the airport to the house by a new CLEAN-SHAVEN DRIVER. He looks out of the window, taking in all the heat and squalor of this hallucinatory, fragmented third world cit INT - ASRA’S HOUSE - DAY 150 BUSSEY sits in the office. EVERYONE is there.
We're doing everything we can to make sure Danny's safe.
We need you to pressure the politicians.
We're on to it. Paul Steiger has been talking to Colin Powell. He’s been talking to President Musharraf.
To do what? Bussey moves on.
Paul has also issued a statement saying that Danny didn’t work for the CIA or the US government. And we're getting the CIA to confirm that.
They’11 confirm that publicly?
Yes. Also, there’s huge media interest. Steve in the press department has had hundreds of requests for interviews.
I don’t want to do it. I don’t want to play into their hands. They want publicity.  151 152 153 154
Blue Revision - 11th Oct 2006 81
It might help. If we get the right people. Something that’s watched here in Pakistan.
The phone rings. RUTH answers.
Mariane... They’re here too.
The suburban Los Angeles home is surrounded by a CROWD OF PRESS avid for news. LONE REPORTERS, TV CREWS scramble around.
Judea is working on getting famous Muslims to issue an appeal for his release.
PICK UP on MARIANE putting the phone down.
Mohamed Ali's agreed to send a statement.
Cat Stevens would be better. They both laugh for a moment at the absurdity of this conversation... BUSSEY is flicking through WHAT TO DO WHEN YOU'RE EXPECTING.
The CAPTAIN and RANDALL are driving together. We see litt flashes of action: raids on places we don’t recognise, arrests of PEOPLE who may or may not have anything to do with DANNY.
NOOR being driven by police driver. MASUD is in the back. NOOR is on the phone. He finishes the call and instructs the drive to go the piwhadai bus station.
Arif is trying to leave for Kashmir. The jeep races off.

The Jeep arrives and NOOR and MASUD get out. They get ona Karachi bus - but Arif is not there. Montage sequence of increasing frustration as they keep searching buses which are heading for Muzaffarabad
See the FBI TEAM with ZAFIR working the phones, searching through hard drives of computers. One of the e-mails was sent from a landline.

KALEEM YUSUF is being shown more computer generated chart showing networks of contacts. Each new number generates more possible suspects. 157 = ’ = 157 Some of the CPLC charts are pinned on the wall next to As and Mariane’s own. The labyrinth is growing. On a computer screen, a new e-mail. Two photographs of DANNY. In one there is a gun to his head, but he is still smiling. The second is more depressing. He looks tired. CAPTION: 03.00 30th January 2002 Asra reading the message
We have come to the conclusion... that he is not working for the CIA. In fact he is working for Mossad.
Bastards.
MARIANE is lying in the bath, gently stroking her bump, rehearsing for her CNN interview.  159 160 83.

I have a message. I have three main points I want to talk about. First, my husband and I are both journalists. We believe in dialogue between civilizations. PICK UP ON Mariane staring in the mirror. Putting her mak up on. Putting on a public face.
MARIANE is dressed up ready to go. BUSSEY, STEVE and ASRA are there waiting for her.
You look great.
Wait... one second. She rushes back to her room and grabs a Kashmiri shawl an drapes it round her shoulders. Then she is back with the others.
That’s good. As Mariane leads the way out Asra tells Bussey
It was Danny’s. EXT/INT - ASRA’S HOUSE/POLICE CAR - NIGHT 160 A starry night sky. BUSSEY walks MARIANE to the police car which is waiting f them. CAPTION: 30th January 2002
You okay?
Fine. They get into the police car. The car jerks forward then stops.

Great. MARIANE can’t help smile.  161 162 Pink Revision - 27th Sept 2006 84 BUSSEY gets out of the car and joins A HANDFUL OF GUARDS push the car. The police car finally starts. INT - POLICE CAR ~— NIGHT 161 ASRA and MARIANE are in the back seat. BUSSEY is coaching her from the front seat.
